Posts.Content: Wow! I am overwhelmed with this surprise!!!  You all are so awesome and encouraging!!! This couldn't be a better group of people that I would want to be associated with.  I will be honored to have you all there with me on Monday on the Pink Bus!  Will let you all know how all the results come out.
Posts.Title: GrannaBeth Needs the PINK BUS -Can you please come along?

Posts.Content: Congrats on finishing up your rads.  I finished my 3 weeks ago.  You will be surprised at how fast your skin will recover.  It has been pretty amazing.  I am slowly getting back the energy levels, but still have to watch that I don't push it too hard cause when I do, it takes me a whole day to recover.  So take it easy at first, rest, be kind to your skin and begin your healing.
Posts.Title: Another Rad Grad Today...YEA !!!

Posts.Content: Wow, CinnamonSmile, you have been through the wringer.  I am so glad that your surgeon thinks that your "plum" is not cancer.  Glad you are able to breathe more comfortably now.  Prayers for your continued healing.
Posts.Title: How Are You Doing Cinnamonsmile?

Posts.Content: Wonderful news! So happy for you. You are an inspiration!      Beth
Posts.Title: Good visit to the oncologists

Posts.Content: Hope this is the birthday ever and you have a fantastic year! Grannabeth
Posts.Title: Yesterday was Cypress Cynthia's Birthday!!!!!
